attributes.action:
Stop crushing bikes in Co Durham
Open somewhere for us to ride safely
attributes.additional_details:
I am an off road enthusiast, I love to take my son out on his bike on a weekend.
I do not ride illegally, I have my own transport.
But, I am even finding it more difficult to enjoy my passion now. 
I have to travel upwards of 2 hours each way just to enjoy an hours fun on my bike.
Some of the private venues are way to dangerous.
We have BMX tracks, skateboard parks etc, Why not a safe motor cross track? I would be willing to give up my time for this cause.
attributes.background:
Peterlee/Durham Police are always posting about off road in our area, the majority of these bikes are crushed!
Why don’t we change this vicious circle, & open somewhere for people to ride safely,  instead of crushing bikes, this is not working.
Charge each person £20 and run lessons for kids

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local leisure facilities are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
